Package io.hbt.bubblegum.core

Class ObjectResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.hbt.bubblegum.core.ObjectResolver
  • public class ObjectResolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides bubblegum-core's large file sharing service.

        Check to see if a URI is available locally.

        Returns:

      • newRequest

        public BgKademliaMessage.KademliaMessage newRequest​(BubblegumNode local,
                                                    RouterNode to,
                                                    java.lang.String eid,
                                                    java.lang.String hostname,
                                                    java.lang.String originLocal,
                                                    java.lang.String uri)
        Build the correct response to a new RESOLVE RPC message.
        Parameters:
        local - The local BubblegumNode sending this.
        to - The requesting node.
        eid - The exchange identifier for the RPC transmission.
        hostname - The declared hostname of the RPC.
        originLocal - The declared proxy/local address of the RPC,
        uri - The requested URI.
        Returns:
        The build KademliaMessage of the response.

      • client

        public Pair<java.net.Socket,​java.io.InputStream> client​(ObjectResolutionDetails details)
        Open up a secure TCP stream to a resolved file.
        Parameters:
        details - The details returned from the RESOLVE RPC exchange.
        Returns:
        the TCP stream and the Socket object it is coming through.

      • getLocalResource

        public ObjectResolutionDetails getLocalResource​(BubblegumNode local,
                                                java.lang.String uri)
        Called to register a local request for a file.
        Parameters:
        local - The local BubblegumNode.
        uri - The file being requested.
        Returns:
        Access details to pass to client() to stream the file.

        Helper method to determine the MIME type of a file.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
